content: The auto-ig-builder "Rebuild" buttons don't seem to work
Are you working from a master branch or something else? If you need a workaround please see https://github.com/fhir/auto-ig-builder#if-you-want-to-manually-trigger-a-build
the one I tried is using main.
it is not critical, just wondering if it was a known problem or not.
I think the auto build is still only doing master, not main.

Correct -- I'm holding the line and not adding support for new default branches unless/until someone else wants to help manage the infra. But we have a write-up on what's needed and I'd be happy to work through design and changes with anyone. (I think this is somewhere on @Mark Iantorno's backlog but if others are motivated to see this happen faster, I bet he'd appreciate the help.)
kicking the build with a change to the repo still works.
the auto-ig-builder is showing all projects as failed.
Hmm. That's not what I'm seeing. #committers/notification also has a log (which seems to show a typical mixture of successes and failures).
the auto-ig-builder dashboard now shows success... this morning it was showing everything failure. I am sure of it.. but it could also have been my chair-to-keyboard interface failure.
